Personal Website

07 Nov 2013 # hosted at http://www.ankanbiswas.in by Ankan Biswas

Learning Html and CSS is not so hard. I learned the basics by analyzing other’s people coding, googling and a few tutorials from w3schools. Yes, not everything works out of the box and in most cases if things aren’t working right then you’re just missing a semi-colon or a parenthesis. Take your time, take a breath, do some research and you’ll be fine. click here for the source code or clone my repository : 

$ git clone https://github.com/talk2ankan/talk2ankan.github.io.git


Copyright (c) 2013 Ankan Biswas

This is my personal website, build and hosted with Jekyll. I started this project as a part of my learning and curiosity. Many thanks to mojombo for his awesome tutorial on Jekyll and providing his blog as a reference.
